summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Central Freeway Park-East Plaza Parking Garage project as contemplated by Ordinance 98854, accepting deeds to certain real property in Blocks 105 and 106, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition, for general corporate purposes (Central Freeway Municipal Garage) and to certain real property in said blocks for park and recreation purposes (Central Freeway Park), and making and appropriation from the Central Freeway Municipal Garage Improvement Fund [1971] for reimbursement to the Park Acquisition and Development Fund for certain payments for the cost of garage-related acquisitions heretofore inadvertently charged thereto.
